mapper.select: SELECT tn.tnm_cd, g.gm_cd, g.gm_nm, tn.tnm_nm, tn.tnm_start_ymd, tn.tnm_end_ymd FROM tournament tn LEFT JOIN games g ON tn.gm_cd = g.gm_cd;
SELECT gm_cd, gm_nm FROM games WHERE gm_cd IN ("gm_01","gm_04","gm_05");
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tournament ( tnm_cd, gm_cd, tnm_nm, tnm_start_ymd, tnm_end_ymd, tnm_addr, admin_id, reg_ymd ) VALUES ( (SELECT CONCAT('tnm_',LPAD(MAX(SUBSTRING(t.tnm_cd,5)+1),2,'0')) FROM tournament t), #{gameCode}, #{tournamentName}, #{tournamentStartDate}, #{tournamentEndDate}, '123', 'id01', CURDATE() );
